units.title: Induce scarring with doxycycline
units.text: Scarring is induced at different time points of organoid development through doxycycline (dox) induction of Cas9.
units.rationale: Induces barcode scars for lineage tracing.

units.title: Introduce iTracer construct by electroporation
units.text: This iTracer construct is introduced by electroporation into iPSCs that contain a doxycycline-inducible Cas9 cassette (iCRISPR)29,30.
units.rationale: Delivers the lineage recorder into stem cells.

units.title: Isolate fluorescent reporter cells by flow cytometry
units.text: Fluorescent cells containing the reporter can be isolated using flow cytometry before being propagated or cryopreserved for later use.
units.rationale: Enriches for cells expressing the lineage reporter.

units.title: Initiate cerebral organoids with barcoded iPSCs
units.text: From these uniquely barcoded iPSCs, we initiate cerebral organoids using approximately 2,000 cells to record lineages during organoid development (Fig. 1b).
units.rationale: Starts organoid culture for lineage tracing.

units.title: Activate Cas9 expression with doxycycline
units.text: Doxycycline introduction into the medium induces Cas9 expression in organoid cells, followed by formation of Cas9–gRNA complexes, leading to double‑stranded break formation at the targeted location in the fluorescent reporter region of the recorder.
units.rationale: Triggers scar generation for barcode recording.

units.title: Measure barcode diversity with scRNA‑seq
units.text: We measured barcode diversity using scRNA‑seq data from three iTracer iPSC pools and found approximately 60,000 unique sequences.

units.title: Track barcode diversity over development with amplicon sequencing
units.text: We followed barcode diversity throughout organoid development using targeted amplicon sequencing of the barcode region.

units.title: Optimize doxycycline concentration and exposure time
units.text: We tested the duration and concentration of doxycycline treatment (Extended Data Fig. 1e,f). We found scarring was most efficient when samples were incubated with 8 µg ml−1 doxycycline for 24 h and applied these conditions in all subsequent experiments.
units.rationale: Establishes optimal conditions for scar induction.

units.title: Perform permutation enrichment analysis on barcode‑traced organoids
units.text: We performed a permutation enrichment analysis using single cells from all lineage‑traced organoids together to determine the likelihood that barcode families were shared between cell clusters (Fig. 1g and Extended Data Fig. 4a,b).
units.rationale: Assesses statistical significance of clonal sharing.

units.title: Visualize clonal distribution with UMAP
units.text: We illustrated regional barcode accumulation by projecting four different barcode families on the overall uniform manifold approximation and projection (UMAP) embedding and observed that iPSC clones were distributed into distinct brain regions.
units.rationale: Shows spatial patterns of clonal contributions.
